did.unittitle: Letter from Townsend Scudder to Mr. King 1951 Dec 22

scopecontent.p: Thanks King for his kind comments concerning The Lonely Wayfaring Man, characterized by its author as a "fascinating journey by a young man in search of the truth and the true meaning of life - finding the answer within himself." Scudder also discusses his plans for a new book on federalism.
